I don't even know where to start with this one. Portal is such an unique experience. Everyone should play this classic sometime.

Love the song at the end...
... and everything else about this game.

Портал. По сути это головоломка с портальной пушкой но... У неё есть сюжет. Странный но сюжет. И во второй части прямое продолжение этого сюжета. Мне эта игра просто взорвола мозги. Это было и круто и умно. Надеюсь и вам понравится.

Initial playthrough was great. Second playthrough I absolutely lost all interest because of the radio transmissions and how disorienting and frustrating getting these can be. Racing against timers in a battle of orientation and hand-eye-coordination is NOT my idea of a good puzzler type game... those belong in RTS and Action/Arcade type games.

Fully enjoyed the mental exercises the game provided, but the experience was overshadowed by the need for nauseously repetitive attempts at overly tedious, time-critical, coordination-intense tasks.

Would highly recommend The Talos Principle over this.

ive lost the will to live after playing this game
10/10

Possibly one of the best vibes ever achieved in a video game. The story was very rounded and tidy too, like it had just enough of everything. It's very dark but lighthearted, with a very satisfying and releaving ending. The puzzles really make you think the first time, but they teach you the mechanics well enough for it not to be frustrating. I really liked the visuals and colour schemes too. Too bad they didn't make it to the second game.

All together a very good experience I often recommend to people when they need a video game. It's absolutely one of my favourite games. After playing it, I imidiately became part of it's community just for how good it is.

Exelent job Nuclear Monkey Software and VALVᵉ!
Das Spiel war zwar kurz aber die Story, das Gameplay und die Rätsel waren unglaublich gut :D
really makes you realise how big of a smoothbrain you are

Muy chu chu chu chu chuli

This classic from Valve has withstood the test of time and is still as fun to play as it was on the day it was released. The challenge maps add a very fun and difficult layer of complexity to the maps, and the advanced maps are also there to pad out the play time after you've beaten the game. It takes a lot of skill and patience to complete Portal, but the game is a masterpiece and should be experienced by everyone at least once in my opinion. Definitely buy it even if it is not on sale, there are very few games that can compare.

Portal is the perfect first video game! 

It gives you the core aspect of how all video games are played whilst also challenging your mind to some hard puzzle’s and having an amazing story to add on top.

Portal has only a select few assets and they are re-used however this works perfectly for the Aperture Science building the player is in. It also works to fit in perfectly with the main storyline of portal! 

Playing this game will not be a mistake and is the first game I’d choose to show someone who has never played video games!
It lives up to the hype.
the first time playing it feels very dizzy 😵️, but the storyline and the concept of the challenge is very cool 😊️❤️
portalları kullanarak bölüm geçiyoruz. niye bu kadar seviyorlar bilmiyorum beni sarmadı.

Portal is a true classic puzzle 3D platformer. If you have never played Portal I highly recommend playing it if you like puzzle games. The story is great. There is also some hidden backstory that you can find too. This game has inspired many modern-day games. This game also has a lot of humor. You can create your own levels too and there are many custom levels online too. This game is short about an hour if you know what you are doing but it is fun. If you want to wait for a sale then this game goes on sale for $1 often but I recommend buying the bundle that includes Portal 2 that goes on sale for $1.50. Is the Cake a Lie?

10 out of 10

i've beat portal 1 like 3 times now and all i have to say is WOW, this is DEFINITELY a game for sure

this game is nowhere near as good as its sequel. its still a fun time, but it feels a bit more dated, is much MUCH shorter, and one or two puzzles could benefit from a little bit of tinkering to make them more captivating. overall, though, this is still a fun time, and i recommend you play it before playing the sequel just to get a feel for it.

7/10
